experience.title: Founding Engineer
experience.description: Joining Autumn as the first founding engineer. Autumn is a platform making credits, limits and usage based billing easy.

experience.title: Product Engineer
experience.description: At LightWork AI, I developed a full-stack web application supported by an array of microservices. These included multi-agent systems utilised by property managers to automate common conversational workflows, including maintenance tasks and compliance renewals. I led the backend team, facilitating team meetings and sprint planning.

experience.title: Graduate Software Engineer
experience.description: At Spark Finance, I developed multiple C# .NET microservices. These included services with event-driven architecture, including stream consumers and producers. Other services I developed orchestrated 30+ services to process data relating to specific companies and directors.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Created Python monitoring tool tracking team performance and leadership metrics. This tool met Cisco's internal standards and remains in active use.
